onChange.script:
#Move the row data to the edit data any time the row id changes
	self.custom.edit_data = self.params.row_data

config.script:
#system.perspective.print("New Drug Screen Button Pressed")
	#Send the message to refresh the table
	messageType = 'refreshDrugScreenDetail'
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)

project = "RITI"
	### Declare parameters 
	time_created = system.date.now()
	user_name = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
	row_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.id
	employee_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.employee_id
	participant_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.participant_id
	drug_screen_type_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.drug_screen_type_id
	provider_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.provider_id
	passed = self.view.custom.edit_data.passed
	score = None
	grade_level = None
	comments = self.view.custom.edit_data.comments
	test_date = self.view.custom.edit_data.test_date
	test_reason_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.test_reason_id
	
	## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
	if (row_id is None):
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print("Row ID Error")
	elif (employee_id is None) or (int(employee_id) < 0):
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print("Employee ID Error")
	elif (participant_id is None) or (int(participant_id) < 0):
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print("Participant ID Error")
	elif (drug_screen_type_id is None) or (int(drug_screen_type_id) < 0):
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print("Drug Screen Type Error")
	elif (provider_id is None) or (int(provider_id) < 0):
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print("Provider ID Error")
	elif (passed is None):
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print("Pass/Fail Error")
	elif (time_created is None):
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print("Created Date Error")
	elif (test_date is None):
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print("Test Date Error")
	elif (test_reason_id is None) or (int(test_reason_id) < 0):
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print("Test Reason Error")
	else:
		valid = True
		system.perspective.print("Drug Screen Detail Data Valid")
		
	### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
	if valid:
		try:
			### Check if the user is creating new data
			if row_id == -1:#Insert new data, no row_id
				path = "Participants/DrugScreen/DrugScreenDetailInsert"
				parameters = {"employee_id":employee_id,"participant_id":participant_id,"drug_screen_type_id":drug_screen_type_id,
							"provider_id":provider_id, "passed":passed, "score":score, "grade_level":grade_level,
							"comments":comments,"time_created":time_created,
							"test_date":test_date, "test_reason_id":test_reason_id,
							"user_name":user_name}
				Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)		
				#system.perspective.print("Insert data")
				#self.view.custom.edit_data = Refresh
			##### Check if the user is editing existing data
			
			elif row_id >= 0:#Update existing data on specified row_id
				path = "Participants/DrugScreen/DrugScreenDetailUpdate"
				parameters = {"employee_id":employee_id,"participant_id":participant_id,"drug_screen_type_id":drug_screen_type_id,
						"provider_id":provider_id, "passed":passed, "score":score, "grade_level":grade_level,
						"comments":comments,"time_created":time_created,"row_id":row_id,
						"test_date":test_date, "test_reason_id":test_reason_id,
						"user_name":user_name}
				#system.perspective.print("Update Table Start")
				Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters)	
				#system.perspective.print(Refresh)
				#system.perspective.print(parameters)
			
			##### The view is openend with a value in the Function parameter that isn't recognized
			else:
				self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")
				Refresh = 0
				
			##### Refresh the table
			if Refresh:	
				#system.perspective.print("Query Success")
				system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshDrugScreenDetail", payload={}, scope="session")
		
		except:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")	
	else:
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving.")

### Declare parameters 
	#CaseNoteId = self.view.params.caseNoteId
	### Declare parameters
	project = "RITI" 
	row_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.id
		
	## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
	if (row_id is None) or (int(row_id) < 0):
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print("Row ID Error")
	else:
		valid = True
		system.perspective.print("Drug Screen Detail Data Valid")
			
	### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
	if valid:
		try:
			path = "Participants/DrugScreen/DrugScreenDetailDelete"
			parameters = {"row_id":row_id}
			Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)		
			#system.perspective.print("Delete Drug Screen")
			#Delete the services associated with the note
			#path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailAttendeeDelete"
			#parameters = {"incident_row_id":row_id}
			#Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
			##### Refresh the table
			if Refresh:	
				system.perspective.print("Drug Screen Detail Query Success")
			#else:
				#system.perspective.print("Query Fail")
				#system.perspective.print(Refresh)
			system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshDrugScreenDetail", payload={}, scope="session")
			
		except:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")	
	else:
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

props.text: Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False
